info.title: Amazon EC2 VPN Connections (Amazon VPC) API
info.description: The API for management VPN Connections (Amazon VPC)

get.summary: Creates a VPN connection between an existing virtual private gateway and a VPN customern      gateway.
get.description: Creates a VPN connection between an existing virtual private gateway and a VPN customern      gateway.

parameters.name: CustomerGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer gateway.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Indicates whether the VPN connection requires static routes. If youttttare creating a VPN connection for a device that does not support BGP,ttttyou must specify true.

parameters.name: VpnGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway.

get.summary: Creates a static route associated with a VPN connection between an existingnttttvirtual private gateway and a VPN customer gateway.
get.description: Creates a static route associated with a VPN connection between an existingnttttvirtual private gateway and a VPN customer gateway.

parameters.name: DestinationCidrBlock
parameters.description: The CIDR block associated with the local subnet of the customer network.

parameters.name: VpnConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPN connection.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpnConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPN connection.

get.summary: Deletes the specified static route associated with a VPN connection between an existingnttttvirtual private gateway and a VPN customer gateway.
get.description: Deletes the specified static route associated with a VPN connection between an existingnttttvirtual private gateway and a VPN customer gateway.

parameters.name: DestinationCidrBlock
parameters.description: The CIDR block associated with the local subnet of the customer network.

parameters.name: VpnConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPN connection.

get.summary: Describes one or more of your VPN connections.
get.description: Describes one or more of your VPN connections.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpnConnectionId.N
parameters.description: One or more VPN connection IDs.
